details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.9 Annotations - 8.9.4.2 Alt properties - Alt and Contents
details.description: Where both Contents and Alt entries are present for the annotation, they shall be identical

rule.description: Where both Contents and Alt entries are present for the annotation, they shall be identical
rule.test: Contents == null || Alt == null || Contents == Alt

error.message: Both Contents and Alt entries are present for the annotation, but they are not identical (Contents = %1, Alt = %2)
